title: D-instanton Induced Effective Action and its Gauge Invariance
abstract:
The effect of D-instantons on closed string scattering amplitudes may be
encoded into an effective action obtained by integrating out the (transient)
open string fields. In order that this respects the gauge invariance of the
theory, the sum of the perturbative closed string field theory action and the
D-instanton induced effective action must satisfy the quantum
Batalin-Vilkovisky master equation. In a previous paper this was proved for the
effective action induced by up to two instantons. We generalize the proof for
arbitrary number of D-instantons.
